name: MediaItem
shortdesc: An sound or movie page item.

property.name: AFTER_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when the value of a property changes on this MediaItem. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_PLACE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a MediaItem is placed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_PLACE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a MediaItem is placed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: associatedXMLElement
property.shortdesc: The XML element associated with the MediaItem.

property.name: transparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings.

property.name: strokeTransparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings for the stroke.

property.name: fillTransparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings for the fill applied to the MediaItem.

property.name: contentTransparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings for the content of the MediaItem.

property.name: textWrapPreferences
property.shortdesc: The text wrap preference properties that define the default formatting for wrapping text around objects.

property.name: linkedPageItemOptions
property.shortdesc: Linked Page Item options

property.name: overridden
property.shortdesc: If true, the object originated on a master spread and was overridden. If false, the object either originated on a master spread and was not overridden, or the object did not originate on a master page.

property.name: overriddenMasterPageItem
property.shortdesc: An object that originated on a master page and has been overridden. Can return: PageItem, Guide, Graphic, Movie or Sound.

property.name: allPageItems
property.shortdesc: Lists all page items contained by the MediaItem.

property.name: allGraphics
property.shortdesc: Lists all graphics contained by the MediaItem.

property.name: parentPage
property.shortdesc: The page on which this page item appears.

property.name: animationSettings
property.shortdesc: The page item animation settings.

property.name: timingSettings
property.shortdesc: The object timing settings.

property.name: allArticles
property.shortdesc: The list of all articles this page item is part of

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the MediaItem.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the MediaItem (a Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval or SplineItem).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the MediaItem within its containing object.

property.name: preferences
property.shortdesc: A collection of preferences objects.

property.name: paths
property.shortdesc: A collection of paths.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: allowOverrides
property.shortdesc: If true, the master page item can be overridden.

property.name: horizontalLayoutConstraints
property.shortdesc: The left margin, width, and right margin constraints this item is subject to when using the object-based layout rule.

property.name: verticalLayoutConstraints
property.shortdesc: The top margin, height, and bottom margin constraints this item is subject to when using the object-based layout rule.

property.name: geometricBounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the MediaItem excluding the stroke width, in the format [y1, x1, y2, x2], which give the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the bounding box.

property.name: visibleBounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the MediaItem including the stroke width, in the format [y1, x1, y2, x2], which give the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the bounding box.

property.name: fillColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of the MediaItem. . Can also accept: String.

property.name: fillTint
property.shortdesc: The percent of tint to use in the MediaItem's fill color. (To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: overprintFill
property.shortdesc: If true, the MediaItem's fill color overprints any underlying objects. If false, the fill color knocks out the underlying colors.

property.name: strokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The weight (in points) to apply to the MediaItem's stroke.

property.name: miterLimit
property.shortdesc: The limit of the ratio of stroke width to miter length before a miter (pointed) join becomes a bevel (squared-off) join.

property.name: endCap
property.shortdesc: The end shape of an open path.

property.name: endJoin
property.shortdesc: The corner join applied to the MediaItem.

property.name: strokeType
property.shortdesc: The name of the stroke style to apply. Can also accept: String.

property.name: strokeCornerAdjustment
property.shortdesc: The corner adjustment applied to the MediaItem.

property.name: strokeDashAndGap
property.shortdesc: The dash and gap measurements that define the pattern of a custom dashed line. Define up to six values (in points) in the format [dash1, gap1, dash2, gap2, dash3, gap3].

property.name: leftLineEnd
property.shortdesc: The arrowhead applied to the start of the path.

property.name: rightLineEnd
property.shortdesc: The arrowhead applied to the end of the path.

property.name: strokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of the MediaItem. Can also accept: String.

property.name: strokeTint
property.shortdesc: The percent of tint to use in object's stroke color. (To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: gradientFillStart
property.shortdesc: The starting point (in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the fill of the MediaItem, in the format [x, y].

property.name: gradientFillLength
property.shortdesc: The length (for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the fill of the MediaItem.

property.name: gradientFillAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the fill of the MediaItem. (Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: gradientStrokeStart
property.shortdesc: The starting point (in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the stroke of the MediaItem, in the format [x, y].

property.name: gradientStrokeLength
property.shortdesc: The length (for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the stroke of the MediaItem.

property.name: gradientStrokeAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the stroke of the MediaItem. (Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: overprintStroke
property.shortdesc: If true, the MediaItem's stroke color overprints any underlying objects. If false, the stroke color knocks out the  underlying colors.

property.name: gapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of a dashed, dotted, or striped stroke. For information, see stroke type.

property.name: gapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint as a percentage of the gap color. (To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: overprintGap
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color overprints any underlying colors. If false, the gap color knocks out the underlying colors.

property.name: strokeAlignment
property.shortdesc: The stroke alignment applied to the MediaItem.

property.name: nonprinting
property.shortdesc: If true, the MediaItem does not print.

property.name: itemLayer
property.shortdesc: The layer that the MediaItem is on.

property.name: locked
property.shortdesc: If true, the MediaItem is locked.

property.name: localDisplaySetting
property.shortdesc: Display performance options for the MediaItem.

property.name: rotationAngle
property.shortdesc: The rotatation angle of the MediaItem. (Range: -360 to 360)

property.name: shearAngle
property.shortdesc: The skewing angle applied to the MediaItem. (Range: -360 to 360)

property.name: horizontalScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal scaling applied to the MediaItem.

property.name: verticalScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical scaling applied to the MediaItem.

property.name: absoluteRotationAngle
property.shortdesc: The rotation angle of the MediaItem relative to its containing object. (Range: -360 to 360)

property.name: absoluteShearAngle
property.shortdesc: The skewing angle of the MediaItem relative to its containing object. (Range: -360 to 360)

property.name: absoluteHorizontalScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal scale of the MediaItem relative to its containing object.

property.name: absoluteVerticalScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical scale of the MediaItem relative to its containing object.

property.name: appliedObjectStyle
property.shortdesc: The object style applied to the MediaItem.

property.name: flip
property.shortdesc: The direction in which to flip the printed image.

property.name: absoluteFlip
property.shortdesc: Indicates whether the MediaItem has been flipped independently of its parent object and, if yes, the direction in which the MediaItem was flipped.

property.name: visible
property.shortdesc: If true, the MediaItem is visible.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the MediaItem.

property.name: topLeftCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to be applied to the top left corner of rectangular shapes and all corners of non-rectangular shapes.Note: corner option differs from end join in which you can set a radius for a corner option, whereas the rounded or beveled effect of an end join depends on the stroke weight.

property.name: topRightCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to apply to the top right corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: bottomLeftCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to apply to the bottom left corner of rectangular shapes.

property.name: bottomRightCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to apply to the bottom right corner of rectangular shapes.

property.name: topLeftCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the top left corner of rectangular shapes and all corners of non-rectangular shapes

property.name: topRightCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the top right corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: bottomLeftCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the bottom left corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: bottomRightCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the bottom right corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: convertShape
method.shortdesc: Converts the MediaItem to a different shape.

parameters.name: given
parameters.shortdesc: The MediaItem's new shape.

parameters.name: numberOfSides
parameters.shortdesc: The number of sides for the resulting polygon. (Range: 3 to 100) (Optional)

parameters.name: insetPercentage
parameters.shortdesc: The star inset percentage for the resulting polygon. (Range: 0.0 to 100.0)  (Optional)

parameters.name: cornerRadius
parameters.shortdesc: The corner radius of the resulting rectangle. (Optional)

method.name: placeXML
method.shortdesc: Places XML content into the specified object. Note: Replaces any existing content.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The XML element whose content you want to place.

method.name: autoTag
method.shortdesc: Tag the object or the parent story using default tags defined in XML preference.

method.name: markup
method.shortdesc: Associates the page item with the specified XML element while preserving existing content.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The XML element.

method.name: findObject
method.shortdesc: Finds objects that match the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeObject
method.shortdesc: Finds objects that match the find what value and replace the objects with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: place
method.shortdesc: Places the file.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.shortdesc: The file to place

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to display the import options dialog (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the placed object(s) (Optional)

method.name: override
method.shortdesc: Overrides a master page item and places the item on the document page as a new object.

parameters.name: destinationPage
parameters.shortdesc: The document page that contains the master page item to override.

method.name: removeOverride
method.shortdesc: Removes the override from a previously overridden master page item.

method.name: detach
method.shortdesc: Detaches an overridden master page item from the master page.

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes the MediaItem.

method.name: fit
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified fit option to content in a frame.

parameters.name: given
parameters.shortdesc: The fit option to use.

method.name: flipItem
method.shortdesc: Flips the MediaItem.

parameters.name: given
parameters.shortdesc: The axis around which to flip the MediaItem.

parameters.name: around
parameters.shortdesc: The point around which to flip the MediaItem. Can accept: Array of 2 Units or AnchorPoint enumerator. (Optional)

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicates the MediaItem at the specified location or offset.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The location of the new MediaItem, specified in coordinates in the format [x, y]. Can accept: Array of 2 Units, Spread, Page or Layer. (Optional)

parameters.name: by
parameters.shortdesc: Amount by which to offset the new MediaItem from the original MediaItem's position. (Optional)

method.name: move
method.shortdesc: Moves the MediaItem to a new location. Note: Either the 'to' or 'by' parameter is required; if both parameters are defined, only the to value is used.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The new location of the MediaItem,in the format (x, y). Can accept: Array of 2 Units, Spread, Page or Layer. (Optional)

parameters.name: by
parameters.shortdesc: The amount (in measurement units) to move the MediaItem relative to its current position, in the format (x, y). (Optional)

method.name: applyObjectStyle
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified object style.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The object style to apply.

parameters.name: clearingOverrides
parameters.shortdesc: If true, clears the MediaItem's existing attributes before applying the style. (Optional)

parameters.name: clearingOverridesThroughRootObjectStyle
parameters.shortdesc: If true, clears attributes and formatting applied to the MediaItem that are not defined in the object style. (Optional)

method.name: clearObjectStyleOverrides
method.shortdesc: Clear overrides for object style

method.name: clearTransformations
method.shortdesc: Clears transformations from the MediaItem. Transformations include rotation, scaling, flipping, fitting, and shearing.

method.name: transform
method.shortdesc: Transform the page item.

parameters.name: in
parameters.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The temporary origin during the transformation. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameters.name: withMatrix
parameters.shortdesc: Transform matrix. Can accept: Array of 6 Reals or TransformationMatrix.

parameters.name: replacingCurrent
parameters.shortdesc: Transform components to consider; providing this optional parameter causes the target's existing transform components to be replaced with new values.  Without this parameter, the given matrix is concatenated onto the target's existing transform combining the effect of the two. Can accept: MatrixContent enumerator, Array of MatrixContent enumerators or Long Integer. (Optional)

parameters.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameters.shortdesc: If true then a ruler based origin is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. (Optional)

method.name: transformValuesOf
method.shortdesc: Get the transformation values of the page item.

parameters.name: in
parameters.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use

method.name: resolve
method.shortdesc: Get the coordinates of the given location in the specified coordinate system.

parameters.name: location
parameters.shortdesc: The location requested. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameters.name: in
parameters.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use.

parameters.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameters.shortdesc: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. (Optional)

method.name: redefineScaling
method.shortdesc: Apply an item's scaling to its content if possible.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The scale factors to be left on the item.  The default is {1.0, 1.0}. (Optional)

method.name: resize
method.shortdesc: Resize the page item.

parameters.name: in
parameters.shortdesc: The bounding box to resize. Can accept: CoordinateSpaces enumerator, BoundingBoxLimits enumerator or Ordered array containing coordinateSpace:CoordinateSpaces enumerator, boundsKind:BoundingBoxLimits enumerator.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The transform origin. Legal specifications: relative to bounding box: anchor | {anchor | {x,y}, bounds kind [, coordinate space]}; relative to coordinate space: {x,y} | {{x,y}[, coordinate space]}; relative to layout window ruler: {{x,y}, page index | bounds kind}. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameters.name: by
parameters.shortdesc: How the current dimensions are affected by the given values

parameters.name: values
parameters.shortdesc: The width and height values. Legal dimensions specifications: {x, y [, coordinate space]}, {x, resize constraint [, coordinate space]}, or {resize constraint, y [, coordinate space]}; where x and y are real numbers and coordinate space is used to determine _only_ the unit of length for x and y; coordinate space is ignored for the 'current dimensions times' resize method). Can accept: Array of Reals, ResizeConstraints enumerators or CoordinateSpaces enumerators.

parameters.name: resizeIndividually
parameters.shortdesc: If false and multiple page items are targeted, the new dimensions are attained only by moving the individual items rather than resizing them. (Optional)

parameters.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameters.shortdesc: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. (Optional)

method.name: reframe
method.shortdesc: Move the bounding box of the page item

parameters.name: in
parameters.shortdesc: The bounding box to resize. Can accept: CoordinateSpaces enumerator or Ordered array containing coordinateSpace:CoordinateSpaces enumerator, boundsKind:BoundingBoxLimits enumerator.

parameters.name: opposingCorners
parameters.shortdesc: Opposing corners of new bounding box in the given coordinate space

method.name: transformAgain
method.shortdesc: Transforms the MediaItem using the last transformation performed on any object. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

method.name: transformSequenceAgain
method.shortdesc: Transforms the MediaItem using the last sequence of transform operations performed on any single object or performed at the same time on any group of objects. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

method.name: transformAgainIndividually
method.shortdesc: Transforms the MediaItem using the last transformation performed on any MediaItem. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

method.name: transformSequenceAgainIndividually
method.shortdesc: Transforms the MediaItem using the last sequence of transformations performed on any single object or performed at the same time on any group of objects. Transformations include moving, rotating, shearing, scaling, and flipping.

method.name: createPlainTextQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Plain Text QR Code on the page item

parameters.name: plainText
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Plain Text  (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new MediaItem. Above parameters can also be passed as properties (Optional)

method.name: createHyperlinkQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Hyperlink QR Code on the page item or document

parameters.name: urlLink
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Hyperlink URL  (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new MediaItem. Above parameters can also be passed as properties (Optional)

method.name: createTextMsgQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Text Msg QR Code on the page item or document

parameters.name: cellNumber
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Text Phone Number (Optional)

parameters.name: textMessage
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Text Message (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new MediaItem. Above parameters can also be passed as properties (Optional)

method.name: createEmailQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Email QR Code on the page item or document

parameters.name: emailAddress
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Email Address (Optional)

parameters.name: subject
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Email Subject (Optional)

parameters.name: body
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Email Body Message (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new MediaItem. Above parameters can also be passed as properties (Optional)

method.name: createVCardQRCode
method.shortdesc: Create Business Card QR Code on the page item or load on document's placegun

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card First Name (Optional)

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Last Name (Optional)

parameters.name: jobTitle
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Title (Optional)

parameters.name: cellPhone
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Cell Phone Number (Optional)

parameters.name: phone
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Phone Number (Optional)

parameters.name: email
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Email Address (Optional)

parameters.name: organisation
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Organisation (Optional)

parameters.name: streetAddress
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Street Address (Optional)

parameters.name: city
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card City (Optional)

parameters.name: country
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Country (Optional)

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card Postal Code (Optional)

parameters.name: website
parameters.shortdesc: QR code Business Card URL (Optional)

parameters.name: qrCodeSwatch
parameters.shortdesc: Swatch to be applied on generated QR Code Graphic . Can accept: Swatch or String. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new MediaItem. Above parameters can also be passed as properties (Optional)

method.name: exportFile
method.shortdesc: Exports the object(s) to a file.

parameters.name: format
parameters.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: If true, displays the export options dialog. (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The export style. (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: asynchronousExportFile
method.shortdesc: asynchronously exports the object(s) to a file.

parameters.name: format
parameters.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: If true, displays the export options dialog. (Optional)

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The export style. (Optional)

parameters.name: versionComments
parameters.shortdesc: The comment for this version. (Optional)

parameters.name: forceSave
parameters.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. (Optional)

method.name: contentPlace
method.shortdesc: Duplicate an object and place it into the target page item.

parameters.name: pageItems
parameters.shortdesc: One or more page items to place or load

parameters.name: linkPageItems
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to link pageItems in content placer (if true it will override link stories value) (Optional)

parameters.name: linkStories
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to link stories in content placer (only applicable for single story, pageItem links will also be created in case of more than one item) (Optional)

parameters.name: mapStyles
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to map styles in content placer (Optional)

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to display the link options dialog (Optional)

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the object.

parameters.name: existingSelection
parameters.shortdesc: The selection status of the MediaItem in relation to previously selected objects. (Optional)

method.name: store
method.shortdesc: Stores the object in the specified library.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The library in which to store the object.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new MediaItem (Optional)

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The key.

parameters.name: value
parameters.shortdesc: The value.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The key.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the MediaItem.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

method.name: toSpecifier
method.shortdesc: Retrieves the object specifier.

method.name: addEventListener
method.shortdesc: Adds an event listener.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)

method.name: removeEventListener
method.shortdesc: Removes the event listener.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)
